description: This file implements a client-side React component for the 'Integrations Wizard' page, facilitating OAuth and PAT integrations for Jira and Confluence connectors. It manages connector state, initiates OAuth flows, handles OAuth callbacks, and allows adding/updating PAT tokens, with corresponding UI elements.

methods.name: WizardPage
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the integrations wizard page with OAuth and PAT management features.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Fetches the list of connectors and filters for Jira and Confluence.

methods.name: onStartOAuth
methods.description: Initiates OAuth process for a given connector.

methods.name: onPatSubmit
methods.description: Saves or updates the PAT connection for a connector.

methods.name: onValidate
methods.description: Validates the current connection for a connector.

methods.name: onRevoke
methods.description: Revokes an existing connection for a connector.
